summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley, discussing a birthday greeting and the cold weather in Chicago. The email contains confidentiality disclaimers and legal notices regarding the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, communicating with Jes Staley about a birthday greeting.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, receiving birthday wishes from Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley share a personal friendship, as indicated by the birthday wishes in the email.

keyFacts: The email was sent on January 20, 2011.
Jeffrey Epstein wished Jes Staley a happy birthday and mentioned that flowers were coming.
The email contains confidentiality and legal privilege disclaimers.
The email indicates a personal relationship between Epstein and Staley.
There is a mention of Chicago's cold weather in the email.
